website_summaries.verdict: Unicorn-themed pop-up tent invites hours of play as a magical secret hiding place. Truly adorable and well-made.
pros: Vibrant colors and attractive pink unicorn designs around a circular tent with a peaked roof
Has mesh window for peeking and an easy-access roll-up door
Includes safety features like secure ties, sturdy poles, and roof and floor anchors to maintain its integrity
cons: Best for one kid to fit comfortably with toys
older kids may find it to be a tight squeeze with more than one occupant

customer_reviews.title: This unicorn tent is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is fantastic! It has a super-fun unicorn design all the way around, and full assembled, it’s a big 3.5 feet across at the base by over 4.5 feet tall! I was able to easily climb inside! It comes with 4 tent poles to give it a little extra structure (you can see them installed in the 3rd picture). This will be a fun place to play or read. The whole thing easily folds away into a small bag that measures just 15”x18”. The unicorn headband is super cute too. This will be a great gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: What a delightful tent!
customer_reviews.text: This Under the Sea tent is beautiful. It was ready to use in minutes. Your kids will not want to leave once they are inside. As you can see in the photo, there is plenty of room in the tent. Excellent quality. We could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Super tent!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is defiantly kid proof - the design of the poles makes it impossible to break despite how rough the kids can be on the tent sometimes and the fabric of the tent hasn't ripped - it's such good quality and size the kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Most excellent Rocket Ship
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old Grandson just loves this!! I put pillows and blankets in the tent and he likes to hang out in the tent with my dog and he sets his laptop on one of the pillow and watches cartoons. Yeah, I know, 4yrs old and has his own Laptop. I had a stick and two rocks at that age. Anyways, Set up time was about 4mins, has roll up door and two side windows to look in or out. oh,oh, and a Flashlight with pictures! Too Cool
customer_reviews.author: Rocket

customer_reviews.title: Great play tent! My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this tent! Matches her ocean themed bedroom perfectly. She loves to sleep in it too! And it definitely stands up to rough play. Great tent! Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toy for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful toy for toddlers. My daughter loves playing hide and seek or shining the flashlight in the tent. Surprisingly, I'm able to fit in there with her. It's very spacious and wonderfully mimics actual camping.
customer_reviews.author: Shaniel81

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This tent is so cute, the bonus flashlight is great. The tent is a lot bigger than I thought, I can fit in there with my daughter. My daughter loves it, it’s a great tent for kids who love the moon, the sky, spaceships & astronauts.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Ripped right away one of the strings that holds the connectible poles up ripped off and now its junk. On with Amazon they want me to send this back lol no box that will fit this but i can package it in saran wrap if you want. This was junk for real. If they fix this issue i will update my kids loved it while jt lasted the last 13 days but now the fun is done. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Moshe B.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. We haven't had any issues with it and it is exactly as I expected. We use this as a quite place or my son who no longer naps but needs down time. He loves reading and resting inside it.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew enjoys this as it keeps him feel safe. It has a blast with this and I recommend it for all kids!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Throw away the kaleidoscope!
customer_reviews.text: The tent itself seems fine so far. It arrived and my husband put it up with little trouble. The problem is the freaking cheap little kaleidoscope that comes with it. The eye hole is just large enough for little people to stick their fingers in! Our three year old stuck his finger through the eye hole and it got stuck. It took us a miserable half an hour to get his finger out and his finger was all cut up and swollen afterward. Do not let your little kid have that kaleidoscope!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this tent
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my 2 year old grandson. He immediately LOVED IT and exclaimed "OCEAN" over and over. Once inside, he was mesmerized by the sea life and wanted to show everyone. He didn't even want to open other presents after this one! He has enjoyed many, many hours of play. At 2 months after Christmas, he will enjoys and plays in his tent daily. Easy to put together. In fact, our son brings it to our house when they visit. Easy to set up and take down. Good quality materials. And again, a beautiful ocean scene!
customer_reviews.author: kl3758

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: This is very poorly made. We have another one for my daughter, different brand, and it’s great! It has ties inside, sewn, for the tent poles, except our tent is missing a set of those. Not sure how the structure of the tent will stand up with that pole not secured. The fabric is so cheap the stitches look like they’re about to come out. It’s really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Wainwright

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, dye from fabric is messy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tent EXCEPT for the dye from the fabric comes off on my kids hands and clothes when they get in it. Very messy. Too bad too become it's a really cool tent, a great size, etc.
customer_reviews.author: JNAO

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous kaleidoscope-trash it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for neighbor who turned 3. She was so excited. While dad set it up she played with “bonus” kaleidoscope. She got her finger stuck in the end. Why would this be appropriate for 3 yr old with a hole open on end. I felt terrible. Her dad has to cut it off. Finger was swollen. I felt horrified she was injured. 😢
customer_reviews.author: DcMs

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tent less than a month ago. It has been up for about a week and it ripped! My kids are ages 1 and 2. They aren’t too wild yet. It’s unfortunate. I’m not sure if I can return since the package has been thrown away. See exposed wire to n the picture!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Fun and great play for kids
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 year old granddaughter told her mom to throw away her bed because she is sleeping in her tent forever! She and her brother spend hours playing in it during the day and, as predicted, she has been sleeping in it every night since her November birthday. Easy to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: DianneS

customer_reviews.title: Love it for my 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this tent. It took less than 5 minutes to put it together. We have carpet so if you have hardwood floors then you are going to need padding underneath or inside. Since I put it up on Christmas it has not come down🥴🥴
customer_reviews.author: Aaliyahyv

customer_reviews.title: Good for 1 kid, not for 2. Got 6 months use out of it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun hideout for my twins. They loved it so much that they were in and out of it all day long. The flashlight isn’t very bright and didn’t get much use. The pieces are very small and easy to misplace. Wick to the tent, we purchased it in January and by July it was in the recycle bin. However, it didn’t last long. Within a few months, it started falling apart. It’s not sturdy and it kept falling down. It’s also not easy to put together. So after a few weeks of having to constantly rebuild it, we got rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Olands

customer_reviews.title: Adorable tent, but not very sturdy ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable tent, easy to set up, a great price and the mini flashlight projector is very cute. BUT it's not very sturdy and topples over easily. You need to be very close when your child is in the tent. I think young toddlers (around 18 mos) probably wouldn't be strong enough to topple it over. But kids 2 and up can push it over with their hands or feet. My son and I still love the tent. It just requires a lot of supervision!
customer_reviews.author: Mom3103

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room, looks cute... rips horribly
customer_reviews.text: So this isn't an easy pop up tent... it has the tent poles you need to put in which isn't horrible. But just after my window to return was gone, the poles began to poke through the tent. I'll have to add fabric of some kind and sew it back together since it literally ripped more than just the seam. But I'm not sure I want to at this point. It does have lots of room and looks cute so if you don't mind sewing it back together every few weeks then it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo loves this, however has managed to take one of the poles apart. I have reached out to customer service multiple times and have gotten no response. The poles need to attach more securely then a tiny tab that it sits in at the bottom bc any kid under 5 is going to take it out. I would have give 4 star if customer service actually replied.
customer_reviews.author: ChiGirl

customer_reviews.title: Lift Off
customer_reviews.text: While my grandson likes this tent very much and we are keeping it. I find the construction of the tent could be better. When i tied the rods to the seems i don't realize to put them in a bow so i could remove them. I tied them in knots. I think they could have used some kind of Velcro instead. I am over 70 and he wants me to play in the tent LOL..somehow I manage. Also the flashlight leaves a lot to be desired. As others have said it does get quite warm in there so I stick my head out to breath once in a while. My grandson has fun and that's what matters.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed!! The poles poked their way out of the bottom after a day or so. Bought one of those cardboard houses for the kids to color last year for only $10 it lasted for 3 months. This tent is a total waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: jack i

customer_reviews.title: my husband and I love this play tent
customer_reviews.text: My 2year old daughter, my husband and I love this play tent. We go in there after we give our daughter a bath, turn off all the lights, and spend a little time making stories with those lenses that could be inserted in the flash light that came with the play tent. Then my daughter goes to sleep. The tent itself is cute and durable, but I love love love the flash light that came with the tent. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great place for a kid to be alone within the home!
customer_reviews.text: With families having to be home more, my granddaughter was so thankful to have a small space of her own with her books, her tea party table and animals and her imagination. Her mom checked on her throughout the day and she was a happy camper holding conversations, "reading" to her stuffed animals and even napping. SO worth it just to give everyone a bit of space.
customer_reviews.author: karinv808

customer_reviews.title: Bit of a let down
customer_reviews.text: First package came opened and returned, and didn't feel I could give this as a gift. Fortunately Amazon handled a return and replacement. Second package arrived new. Tent is of ok quality, but a little fiddly to assemble and doesn't just spring up like I hoped it would - it needs additional supports you install inside the tent. Quality is a little poorer than I hoped for and the additional flashlight with space pictures is so dim it only works in total darkness. Boy this was a gift for loved it none the less, kids are great! Probably wouldn't buy this again for another child.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Batsford

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely looks not like the one advertised, to put up and take off you need to use sticks which it’s not easy as pop up tent. Basically if you want to Put it away daily it’s not easy. Worst was shipping as you can see at the picture it was shipped just like that, seems like I received used one and one of the wire holding part was not stitched properly it came out when was trying to tie. I did not reorder it.
customer_reviews.author: alkannyc

customer_reviews.title: Cute tent but be careful
customer_reviews.text: The tent is pretty easy to put together. The only issue we had was that there are (4) little ties on the tent to secure the poles in the middle. When I tried to knot it the tie separated from the tent. Without the pole being tied the pole won’t stay in place holding the side of the tent up. Also the flash light is a nice added addition and does include batteries. It’s pretty small but perfect for little hands. It come with 3 little inserts that slip inside the flashlight but be careful because the could be choking hazards for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Davis

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it, but could be much better
customer_reviews.text: The size is great for my 5 year old and she loves it. But I hate it and here's why. First the setup is easy to do but not clear. The side supports are not labeled on which way is up, one side is shorter than the other but easily mistaken if your doing it without knowing or reading the pamphlet. The tie string on one side broke withing the first 5 minutes of my daughter going in the tent. A couple days later there's a hole poked through the bottom of one of the supports. I don't see this lasting past 6 months. I would pay more if it was a little bit better put together.
customer_reviews.author: T.Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Did not last a day *edited
customer_reviews.text: ***edited***As a lot of people are saying, the tent did not last a day. One of the poles split and the bottom fabric that holds the the poles went right though =( *Edit* the company contacted us after our review and set us up with a free replacement. We got it just in time for my son's birthday! We have now had it set up with a lot of use in the play room for over a week now and have had no problems! We're very happy :)
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son which is 20 months old. He loves it and it's bigger than I expected it to be. Only issue is it's not very sturdy and he looks to push it over into it's side which has already put a hole at the top of the tent. They should of made the top part more durable and thicker so this wouldn't happen. It's a shame that it's already broken and I had to tape the top. UPDATE: I reached out to the seller and they took immediate action in correcting this issue. They sent out a replacement. Went up on to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lingling

customer_reviews.title: Just buy It
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good size! Very cute and easy to assemble and use. My little girl loves it and she “kinda moved in” lol she put her toys and add a snack bowl and her water , she is all set in there. It’s one of my success purchases I’ve ever made for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Stjd

customer_reviews.title: Love that the tent came in a zippered bag to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that the tent came in a zippered bag to store it in, it was easy to put up and sit in the corner of the living room so she could have her space ship adventure. The flashlight with the different projector slides was really cool to use, especially when you cut all the lights off to give it that dark space look. She was able to put a pillow and blanket in there so she could have a all night space adventure to pretend like she is sleeping on the moon. My only gripe was that we could not get the tent to fold back down flat and put it back in the zippered bag right/
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: So much fun for my 18 month old!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when he was around 16 months. Has so much fun crawling in and out of it! Just sitting inside is a game to him. The only downside is when he tries to walk in he knocks his head but it’s so light it never hurts him. He actually laughs if he knocks it over. Worth the money!! Easy to take down when we feel like more room and pop back up for some play time.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love it - easy to build and use flashlight
customer_reviews.text: This is really great, our son loves it and the flashlight is really great he loves it all - great price too. If you have someone to hold the tent up when putting in the poles it's very easy to assemble about 10 minutes or less. The flashlight came with batteries too whixh is really great and the slider discs are great. Just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Hamad

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious!
customer_reviews.text: This was so fun for the shirt time it lasted. Easy to out together. Great price. Can fit and adult and a child - plenty of room. My only complaint is the durability. It comes apart fast. The first time my kid knocked it over (boys) one of the piles bent. The. Another popped out. It seems to be permanently altered. It's ashame is can't handle rough kids - youd think it be more durable expecting littles to go in and out of it a bazillion times.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Tent is life.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my toddler for Christmas. He is now the tiny tent hermit that lives in our living room. This elusive view of him poking his head out is a rare sight, indeed! He welcomes visitors but don’t overstay your welcome or he’ll shine the included flashlight in your face while yelling at you to “get out!” All in all, I’m pretty sure he’s happy with his gift... if I ever see him again, I’ll ask.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Young

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tent for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Got this tent for my 18month old who instantly fell in love. Was easy to assemble. Noticed a few holes in it and was going to return it.. but it serves as a good distraction for my kid during this lockdown. One thing to watch out for is that kids can easily topple the tent over, or lean against the walls and fall. So if you have a hard uncarpeted floor that’s something you’d want to watch out for. Has 2 netted windows on the sides that you can use to keep an eye on your child.
customer_reviews.author: Abhay Bhangale

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea, Needs better quality.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of the rocket ships play tent for our 2 grandsons. They arrived as promised in time for gifts. One tent broke the day it was put together. One of the metal stays bent when my grandson entered the tent. We ‘fixed’ it so that he could use the crooked tent. He used the tent to read his books and watch his Kindle. It looks pathetic. Both tents have problems with the fabric un-raveling. Cute tents, it’s a shame that the quality isn’t the same.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Ridenour

customer_reviews.title: Not simple to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Cool design, good size. The adult has to crawl inside the tent to assemble the structure- I do not like that. Update- It's been nearly a year, and I was recently contacted by the seller. While I was not entirely happy with the tent, the seller went out of their way to make it right. I was very much impressed by the level of customer service I received. As a result, I’m changing my rating from two stars to four. Tent is still cool and has held up well, and it’s still a pain to assemble. But my kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Taradan

customer_reviews.title: Love this, but already ripped after 5 days! UPDATED REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE from one star review: The seller contacted me after leaving my review within hours. Very polite, very helpful and wants to make it right. My tent is being replaced free of charge!! Thank you for being an honest business owner!! —————————————————————- Adorable tent, easy to put together, but it is sooooo thin! I saved this for a Christmas gift and after only 5 days of normal play, the bottom has tiny little holes in it and one of the poles that holds it together has broken through the side of the tent. It’s only a matter of time before the whole thing rips and is useless. Too late to return or exchange it, but we all love it... 😕
customer_reviews.author: C. S. M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tent- couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: i love that this has poles so it's nice and solid when built. The look is great for our little astronaut- I especially like the silver top. My son (age 4) adores his tent and the projector, though the projector doesn't seem to auto shut off and takes odd batteries I think, plus doesn't store the films onboard. Anyhow, that's a bonus, the tent is awesome and should last years!
customer_reviews.author: KNile

customer_reviews.title: Best Toy I could have bought
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a hit with my great grands, both girls, they've spent time in this little tent everyday since I purchased this product a couple months ago. It's seems to be like a Club house for the 2 of them, we all need a moment to ourselves at any age. My Granddaughter said to me "Grandpa this has been by far, the best toy you could have ever purchased for our girls, they both love it!
customer_reviews.author: David L Byrer

customer_reviews.title: Good play tent! Bigger than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually happy with this. My 8 year old put it together herself. Its bigger than I thought it would be, she can practically stand in it. It is comparable to other play tents. The kids cannot jump on it. This is a great quarantine pandemic kid reward for doing schoolwork at home.
customer_reviews.author: Texas momma

customer_reviews.title: Cute tent but hard to break down
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this based off of reviews. Mine arrived dirty like it had been used so I ordered a replacement. Then, as I tried to break it down to put it away, it was IMPOSSIBLE to get into the bag. I watched videos on how to fold it up and mine will not. I tried 100 times to break it down and cannot for the life of me get it to fit into the bag. Overall it’s a cute tent but good luck breaking it down to put away.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Barton

customer_reviews.title: Exciting Gift
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing a special gift for my niece last holiday season, I tried to find something my nephew would get excited about too. He loves space and as a big brother to a toddler, I figured he may want his own little private place to escape. I was right about his excitement, but wrong about him wanting his own space. He and his sister play in this together all the time. It was even used as a great hiding place in a game of hide-and-go-seek during a recent visit. They were so excited about seeing the tent that it was just an awesome added bonus later when they realized there was a projector to play with. Awesome gift :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Vice

customer_reviews.title: Cute but was not durable**updated, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Updated**** Great customer service- they sent us a new one, so far it’s been a more durable experience! We’ve had this for less than two months - I have Two girls, a 4 yo and a one yo, neither rough housed with the tent -And it is already torn at the entrance and one of the poles keeps popping out/can’t be reattached. Super disappointed because my girls loved it & would actually play together in there :( Cute- 5 stars Easy to assemble- 5 stars Durability- 1 to 2 stars
customer_reviews.author: Christy Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Kids and the dog love this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, their kids (4yo and 1yo) love this and so does the dog. Putting it together is easier with two people. The material is a little flimsy (tent and flashlight) which is why it gets 4 stars instead of 5. However, for the price it's a steal. I wouldn't be putting this up and taking it down constantly, it wouldn't stand up to that. It's great for a play room where it is just stays up. Doubt it would be as good outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and I think I love it more than him. Super easy set up, cute tent, slightly big for a tiny apartment that I have but it's so cute and so fun! I was super excited for the flashlight but haven't gotten to use it because it needs expensive tiny batteries that I didn't know about so I have that hiding kind of an extra perk if your okay with buying the batteries. The tent is SOO worth it! Loved it and good price for the product value.
customer_reviews.author: olivia carril

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I wanted to surprise our two year old daughter this this tent. She calls herself a princes and won’t wear anything (undies included) unless it has “corn-corns” on it. So we assumed that this castle would be perfect! However, we were sad to notice that the seams on the tent didn’t even always line up or over lap the parts they were supposed to. Leaving gaps in the tent roof and evidence of unraveling in areas. She however loves it. And has spent all evening in it with her pony friends and unicorn books. So it’s nice for temporary fun but truthfully not worth the money. Also the instructions leave much to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Not a Bot

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it didn't
customer_reviews.text: While the first few weeks of this hanging around the house were good, after about three weeks, one of my kids bumped one of the support poles, which ripped it off the wall. Now the thing won't stand up properly. I'm having to hand-sew the support ties back on every week or two. If you want something that'll last, I would pass on this one. If you just want an occasional-hangout spot for calm kids, maybe you'll have better luck than I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Man Cave
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my 2-year-old grandson. He loves it. It is quite roomy, allowing him to pull in his little chair and favorite blanket. As of this review it is holding up well to all the abuse that my grandson, 2 grown male cats and a large dog can throw at it! Let's hope it remains that way.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Holding up to hyperactive 3yr old
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy, easy to put together.. If you're tall like me (over 6ft) then crawling inside to put poles in might be tricky but doable. It's been tipped over few times and hasn't broken yet.. It's very bright and colorful. I expect it would last a long time for kids that are gentle with their toys, I'll be lucky if it lasts 6months before poles snap. Overall good product and worth the money :)
customer_reviews.author: MomOfDressesAndMesses4

customer_reviews.title: Flashlight does not come with tent.
customer_reviews.text: The original shipment did not include the projector light, even though the box said that it was included. Amazon sent me a new one. Expect to receive the tent without the light. My son loves the tent. He is able to pull it into different rooms in our house and put it on his bed. It cannot be used as a tent on the bed because it has a bottom on it. The flashlight ended up being a disappointment because it does not project stars or the moon. It only has pictures of astronauts and 1-2 plants.
customer_reviews.author: Arden

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: my grandson was so excited to sleep in his rocket ship tent that he went to bed early. The only problem we had was when he wanted to fly it around as a rocket and started rolling in it on the floor. He's 5 and i was a little worried he would snap one of the poles. Also he liked the little flashlight but the pictures from discs had to be small to get a good focus on pictures. But for the price, it made a little boy who loves space very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M Prickett

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and attractive
customer_reviews.text: It's very cute and my grandchildren loved it. Not sure it is as spacious as I expected for three kids but it can still fit three very small children. My Grandchildren enjoyed playing with the flashlight it came with. It's a little flimsy and will tip over with active kids. Overall, it's a great product that I can comfortably leave in my living room when I know the grand-kids are visiting often.
customer_reviews.author: cristina santini

customer_reviews.title: My son loves
customer_reviews.text: My six year old son really enjoyed this tent he didn't want to get out of it he wanted to sleep in it and watch his shows on his tablet. As far as the instruction they were not to good but if you have put up a tent the you could figure it out. As far as the quality of the tent it was not bad for the price. The space torch projector was my favorite part I loved looking at the picture it reminded me of a toy I had as a kid and it was so cool to look and play with in the dark with my son . Overall it was a cool.
customer_reviews.author: TMcfadden

customer_reviews.title: Over the moon!
customer_reviews.text: My son woke up to this on his third birthday and LOVED it. Apparently we aren't very capable because it took three grown adults to figure out how to put the thing together. But once we got the hang of it it was very easy. It's bigger than I imagined but still fits in my son's tiny bedroom and he is over the moon about it. 💛
customer_reviews.author: Lionheart

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered today. Quick delivery from ordering all the way to South Africa . Looks like picture, seems steady enough. Hope it holds up nicely. It’s an immediate hit with my kids 4 and 3. Enough room for both Quite large I can easily fit into it. But then I’m petite (5ft talk).
customer_reviews.author: BM~SouthAfrica

customer_reviews.title: Not A Easy Pop Up Tent
customer_reviews.text: This is labled as a pop up tent, so I was thinking easy, fold up, slide under the bed when not in use. It is not. The 4 poles have to be taken out when you want to store it. Its easy to assemble, but not when you have a 3 yr old saying are you done yet...lol. its very cute, inspite of the misleading description though, so I do recommend it it for unicorn loving girls ;)
customer_reviews.author: Smay in Louisiana

customer_reviews.title: Fun tent and space scenes flashlight
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grandson loves this tent. Very easy to put together. Colorful and matches well in his space themed bedroom. He enjoys playing in it. Very lightweight, easy to drag around, which he does. Would love to have a heavier bottom so it wouldn't move as easily. A couple of small children can sit inside comfortably. This flashlight was a huge hit and he carried it around the first few days demonstrating it to his family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: grammy

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for boys and girls
customer_reviews.text: I gave this toy to my daughter (2y) this Christmas, and she absolutely loves it. She plays in it, takes her toys inside and sometimes also invites her brother and me to join, and we have a lot of fun. The tent is big enough for her to stand inside, and even I can sit. It is sturdy and well done, very beautiful with the stars all over it and also very easy to mount. We mounted it after Christmas, and until now, it is still mounted and being used almost every day. And just for the record: even if it says "play tent for boys", it is a great gift for girls, too!
customer_reviews.author: Dirk

customer_reviews.title: What a hit! My toddler LOVES this thing !
customer_reviews.text: this little spaceship is AWESOME! Got it for my 3 year old and he absolutely loves it. It’s tall enough that he can stand up with room left at the top (he’s like, 100cm) and I like that it has two fairly large oval mesh windows . Aside from the tent the package comes with a little projector and that’s been a hit too . This is totally cool, fun, lightweight and easy to clean .Would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mia & AJ

customer_reviews.title: Fun under the sea adventure 🐠🐠🐠
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter's birthday present. Has 4 collapsible poles. To assemble you place the poles in pockets and tie them inside the tent to keep in place. (Don't make a knot or it'll be a pain when you need to take it apart.) There is also a carrying case and kaleidoscope. My only disappointment - I found the same tent (different design) for half the price in a store.
customer_reviews.author: The Shopping Penguin

customer_reviews.title: It has a lot of room inside.
customer_reviews.text: Its really cute and it's big . I fit in there with my grandson and could easily fit another adult . He got it on Christmas and really likes it lot.The flashlight that comes with it is really cute and works best if you turn the lights off. Most of the time he lays in there and plays with his tablet or toys. It's very easy to put together and take apart. I never tried to put it back into the bag it came with but I would guess it wouldn't be hard at all. The customer service is genuine and replies fast to all questions.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tent!
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves this tent! It's actually a lot bigger than I expected, as soon as my son opened his present we had to put it together. Very easy to do in about 5 minutes, and the bonus flash light with projector disk was a huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Too cute. Absolute hit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4yr old godson. Omg he loves it. We pulled it out of the bag and it popped right up. Very easy to assemble. The rods just pop right together and slip right inplace without any trouble. I was able to find batteries for the little flashlight at the local pharmacy. My godson has not came out of the tent since we put it up. He even ate his dinner " on the way to the moon. " The only thing I would say about this is the flashlight. The AR13 batteries can become costly if your little one leaves the flashligh on constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Brown

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but not the most sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This tent is really beautiful. The first one did have a couple glitches but the company replaced it and with excellent customer service. If your kid is extremely mellow, you won’t have any issues. If your kid is a little rowdy, you may want to wait till they settle down a bit. It seems to be made as a quiet nap or book nook, not for kids to run in and out of.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Sands

customer_reviews.title: hit for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 2 year old niece for Christmas and she loved it. As soon as we built it for her she wanted to put all her favorite toys in there and sleep there for the night, only bad thing is that it was a bit tricky to build it since you have to be inside of it to put put the poles up.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Great and pretty tent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 y.o niece and she loves it. It took about 5 minutes to put together and I set it up right when it arrived. She put her small table and stool inside the tent and loves the two windows. She plays, eats and sleeps in her tent. it also came with a unicorn headband. It's big enough to fit two small kids and doesn't take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: mtkuma83

customer_reviews.title: It's a fun play house both inside and out!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great play tent. But you have to remember that it is a tent. If you are expecting something indestructible than you will be disappointed. It's a tent! My grandson loves it. We use it inside and outside. It shades him while outside and creates wonderment. We even have picnics in it! Messes clean up easy with a sponge. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: RMc

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it's a qulaity product. We will know at Christmas
customer_reviews.author: tina malecha

customer_reviews.title: Poles did not holdup. Broke in 2 weeks. The handheld viewer broke immediately.
customer_reviews.text: The tent was purchased as a birthday gift for my great grandson's 5th birthday. He loves it in his room to make believe he's blasting off. The handheld picture viewer is very cheaply made, hard to use. Have to work with him when he uses it. For the price, that could have been more durable for children to use. Tent poles don't always stay in place at the top. But he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and spacious tent..love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tent for my 5 yr old. I took it out of the bag and the set up was real easy. My son was excited and he has been in it since I set it up. The projector flashlight that came with it, is also amazing; he loves the space images. Definitely a good purchase. This will definity be a tent that he plays with for a very long time. Very spacious, he can sit in the tent and bring a bunch of his toys with him to play.. I would definitely recommend this tent to anyone looking for a durable and spacious tent for their child.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Price

customer_reviews.title: First bad review on amazon product . Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know weather there are any reviews has mentioned These problems earlier but here are the major issues. 1. Very small compared to other one is available in $16 2.Doesn’t have any pockets for rods just have small pockets at the bottom to tuck it in. Kids try to hold it and it falls .mojor issue. Other one I had earlier had pockets from bottom to top used to keep it in place and well hidden. 3. Does not looks like $30 product at all. 4. If you are looking for more spacious, for children under 24 months , more stable this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Priya M

customer_reviews.title: Adorable. Sturdy. Easy set up. Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We just got this today! My 23 month old LOVES it. He didn’t want to come out. It took me about 10 minutes to set up, so super easy installation of the 4 rods (which were sturdy IMO). The little flashlight was adorable and already had batteries. This was seriously the best $25 I’ve spent in awhile! And it’s good size. It fits in the corner of our living room perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JaidenRV

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to set up!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our son just turned 5 and I thought a tent would be perfect. He LOVES this!!! He has slept in it every night and loves the flashlight that comes with it. It was super easy to set up and is very sturdy. I would purchase this again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hezaafii

customer_reviews.title: The kids love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter, but it turns out my older kid loves it too. Since we set it up, they've been in it practically non stop. We've only had it up a few days, so time will tell how it holds up to these little monsters, but so far so good. Easy set up, and easy to put away (I did a practice run), especially if you've used similar products before (beach tents, etc) The only drawback is if you don't have much space, it's fairly large. In our house that means using it in common areas because it doesn't really fit in the kids' bedrooms. But seriously , it's worth it for some peace and quiet, LOL!
customer_reviews.author: KAUI78

customer_reviews.title: Unraveling at the seams
customer_reviews.text: We love this tent—bright, vibrant colors, great pictures. Unfortunately, we haven’t had it that long and it’s already coming apart! Any place that there is support is now ripping. The stitching is coming apart where the body of the tent connect to the bottom. It’s just unraveling. Very unfortunate-our daughter loves her tent but now we have to get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: I.C.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Product
customer_reviews.text: We've had this tent for 3 months now and it's held up surprisingly well. I have a 2 and 4 year old and they are ROUGH with this tent. They'll wrestle in it, roll it in its side when they're still inside and then roll throughout the house. Hast fallen apart or ripped yet. This was a great quarantine purchase to help keep them busy and still allow them to use their imaginations.
customer_reviews.author: LAWRENCE D DIVINE

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son’s 4th birthday, and by lunchtime one of the seams had ripped, about 6 inches long. I was able to patch it because I’m handy with a needle, but a week later I can see the seams ready to give way where the poles are inserted. I was also dismayed to find that it was not a pop-up, but actually required assembly with poles and ties. That may have been in the description and I just didn’t read it closely enough, but it is still inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Update: the company emailed me and gave me a full refund and a new tent. That was very wonderful for them to try to make this right. Let’s hope this one holds up better. After a month and a half the bottom was ripped to the point we had to throw it away. And my kids definitely weren’t rough with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Zoul

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: Great tent! I bought my boys storm troopers costumes because it's similar to astronaut costumes by cheaper! 4 starts because the quality of the top of the tent isn't the greatest and a smoke hole was torn in it while setting it up and the instructions can seem a bit confusing. Other than that my boys loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Genny

customer_reviews.title: Kid Approved - High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this unicorn tent. I have a 7 year old daughter who LOVES unicorns who is very tall for her age and fit inside this tent fine. It seems to be sturdy and well made. It was a good value and is definitely kid approved.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and a very trustworthy seller. Recommended purchase for your little ones
customer_reviews.text: The product I received initially started to show signs of wear and stitches loosening out within a month. The seller was prompt to send out a replacement. This one looks more sturdy and the stitches looks like they will hold for a good long time. The tent looks good any kiddo loves playing in there. The response from the seller in addressing my concern also highlights the fact that they really care for their customers and want to offer best quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Jithin

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love it
customer_reviews.text: This was for our grandkids ages 2 & 5. We set it up inside the house and we have porcelain floors and it slid all over (not what was intended). I put a thick sleeping bag under it, which didn't seem to help. It really needs to be on a low pile carpet. The 2 yr old enjoyed trying to move it while inside. Looking back, I think they're too young to utilize it the way I envisioned!! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most Popular Christmas Gift This Year!!
customer_reviews.text: My five-year-old niece absolutely LOVED her tent, making me the most popular aunt this Christmas. Unfortunately, she opened it first, making the rest of the gifts -- even those much more expensive and/or tech-ie -- pale by comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Lawyer

customer_reviews.title: This tent was good for us
customer_reviews.text: This tent was good for us. Generally I agree with other reviews that state that the quality is so-so WRT some of the seams, but it has held up ok for us. We put it in the corner of the playroom and our sun uses it as his little fort. We stuffed it with pillows and he enjoys going inside to wave the flashlight around on the top of the tent. +1 for the horrible picture quality of the images that can be displayed with the flashlight. Sheesh, don't even bother. I chucked that immediately after taking a quick look-see during the un-boxing. Other than that, we'd recommend it with a grade of B or so.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Adair

customer_reviews.title: Not for small children
customer_reviews.text: Took outside and wind very light broke ties to hold it up. Now need to sew back in or get new one. Now the colidascope that came with tent cause injury to my grandson. Ambulance had to come out to get his finger out of the hole in top of the toy. So not made for totlers. Causes injuries his finger was hurt bad lots of tears.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjanetta D Williams

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a friend's 3 year old son's birthday who is just getting into the Woody/Buzz years! Well I had it delivered to the office and couldn't wait to open it! Super easy assembly, and came with an extra toy (little flashlight for little hands) that projects space images on the wall. So cute! Happy purchase!
customer_reviews.author: PinkyFloyd

customer_reviews.title: Sure to be a hit!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a little 4yr old girl who wants to be an astronaut..it was her B-day..they had to open and assembled it as soon as she saw it...it was admired by older and younger there..it was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Great gift !!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this tent I bought this for my 2 year old son for Christmas. It was really easy to assemble and so far it doing great it very Durable and I think anybody want a tent should get this one. My son loves this tent I love it too he can’t stop playing in it great gift very happy with my purchases
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Space tents, the final frontier....
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together even though the instructions were vague. It’s sturdy and My 19 month old loves it!! He wants to lean against the walls and if I wasn’t inside it would fall over but that’s just something I’ll have to teach him not to do. It’s not a problem with the tent. I didn’t realize that it came with a little flashlight projector with 3 slide discs. It’s so fun to use inside the tent and shine onto the canopy. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Playtime Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest tent. Very roomy and detailed, 2 adults and baby can sit snuggled inside with well over a foot of headroom. We and the baby just love this and she will enjoy it for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: safarigal

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as Christmas present for my son. He absolutely loves it. It only took 5 min to put together. Have not tried to disassemble get for storage so we'll see about that part. Very sturdy. A lot bigger than I anticipated though. Can fit 4-5 small children sitting comfortably. At least 2 kids can sleep in it. Well made and perfect for play or sleepovers.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Daddazio

customer_reviews.title: Neat Tent!
customer_reviews.text: Neat Tent! This is such a neat tent. I'm looking forward to many hours of fun with my grandchildren in this tent shining the flashlight/projector on the ceiling or walls of the tent. It is so easy to assemble, it just pops together. It is also so easy to clean up spills with a damp cloth. It is also easy to take down and put in the carrying bag. It also stays cool inside with the mesh windows and fold up door. Great price for something that will provide hours and hours of entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, but Just ok quality.
customer_reviews.text: It came with a loose seam at the very top. I’m glad to know how to saw and repaired it. The hazLe of returning it after my son waited with such excitement, was not worth it. It is holding so far, but It is not the beat construction for this type of product. The instructions are easy to follow and only took a few minutes to assemble. I added lights to make it more exciting. My son loves it and it is very spacious
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable little tent that is perfect for a corner of the room hide away.
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool little tent. Perfect for toddlers. Price can't be beat. We had another tent before that was awful and needed to be taken down constantly. This tent is small enough that it can actually be left up but has plenty of room for my boys (1 and 4 years), their blankets, pillows, and stuffed animals. They created their own little hide away inside. We even bought the castle which is the same design as a holiday gift for our cousins (ages 2 and 5 years).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute and spacious!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my stubborn butt of an 8 yr old daughter so maybe she would participate in her online schooling. She loved it and hopefully she will use it to do what she's supposed to. It was super easy to set up, came with it's own storage tote, and the designs are cute, but realistic without any faded or washed out graphics. Seems pretty sturdy for a kids play tent. Time will only tell if my kids make it last.
customer_reviews.author: Monster's mom

product_meta.title: USA Toyz Unicorn Play Tent for Kids, Indoor Pop Up Playhouse Tent for Girls and Boys with Included Unicorn Headband and Kids Tent Storage Carry Bag
feature_bullets: PRINCESS TENT FOR GIRLS: These play tents for girls and boys are perfect for play dates, reading, toy storage, and more; toddler tent includes 1 unicorn headband and an easy-carry travel tote bag

EASY SETUP POP UP PLAY TENT: Assemble this kids pop up tent with the included foldable tent poles (no tools required); see detailed assembly instructions with illustrations in the included user manual
EASY CLEANING PRINCESS TOY: This pop up tent for kids features fun, one-of-a-kid unicorn design; made with water-resistant polyester fabric that’s easy to clean with damp cloth, mild soap, and water
SPACIOUS INDOOR KIDS TENTS: This toddler indoor tent measures 51" H x 40.5" D and fits up to 3 children; features wide tie-back door and mesh windows for ventilation and for parents to monitor kids
PERFECT FOR KIDS: Made with nontoxic, kid-friendly materials; this play house tent for girls and boys has CPSC and CPSIA kid-safety and quality certificates

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars6,185 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
